Name: Vanilla Vodka Sour
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Flute glass .
Prepare lemon and orange zest for garnish.
Express lemon and orange zest twists over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Vodka Sour with a blast of spicy vanilla.
Nutrition: One serving of Vanilla Vodka Sour contains 193 calories
